response.job_title: Structural Engineer at Decon Structural Engineering
response.summary: I am a passionate structural civil engineer with over two years of experience as a professor’s assistant in Universidad Nacional de Colombia. I consider myself a fast learning and problem-solving oriented person with excellent communication skills that enjoys working closely with others. I have a strong technical background in Numerical Analysis and I am fluent in Spanish, Italian and English.
response.skills: Project Management, Structural Analysis, Teamwork , Problem solving, Teaching, Leadership, Abaqus, ArcGIS, QGIS, Microsoft Excel, Ingegneria strutturale, AutoCAD, AutoCAD Civil 3D, SAP2000, Matlab, Fortran, Revit, LaTeX, Analisi numerica, Advanced Structural Design

education.degree_name: Master of Science in Civil Engineering

company.name: DECON LLC - Structural Engineering
company.description:
MBE | SBE | DBE | HUB | HHF, TBPE Firm No 16156
DECON LLC ,founded by Fulvio Jaramillo, a consulting engineering firm committed to technical excellence, DECON’s services help build, maintain and improve our clients’ infrastructure and facilities. Our goal is to always provide exceptional engineering services that deliver projects on schedule, within budget, and with commitment to outstanding quality that meets our client’s complete satisfaction.
DECON is a professionally registered engineering company in Texas, Georgia, Virginia, Florida, Oklahoma, Maryland and Louisiana.

Our 20+-person staff delivers services that are focused on:
• Development and production of final structural/civil construction documents CD / PS&E
• Conceptual and schematic project development
• Preliminary structural/civil layouts
• Bridge and structural analysis design
• Construction budget and schedule preparation
• QA/QC implementation, plans and constructability review
• Design peer review
• Bridge and structural inspection and bridge condition assessment
• BIM/BRIM Modeling and3D rendering and visualization using Autodesk® and Bentley® platforms
